title: New: The 1975 – Chocolate
content:
Adorably sleazy Manchester group The 1975 finally appear to be taking over the world, after what seems like years of name changes, re-releases and hiccups.

Newest single Chocolate is slightly seedy pop at it’s very best, complete with jerky guitar riff and anthem written all over it. Taken from their upcoming third EP Music For Cars, Chocolate was premiered via Zane Lowe earlier last week, check it out below, as well as their tour dates here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
